name: Juan Diego de Miguel Mateo

info.label: Frontend Developer
info.brief: 4+ years developing webapps with special passion and interest in all areas of Frontend development.
info.quote: Details and motivation are the key to success

projects.title: Miles and More - Lufthansa AG
projects.summary: Miles and More web app allows the user to do flight reservations with personal miles, upgrade reservations to different fares and many other services.
highlights: Full renovation of the current MaM application from JSP + JQuery to Angular 2 (developing the project in the first beta versions of Angular 2) in Typescript.
In charge of developing the availability flight table + seat map, complex interfaces that need to be re-rendered efficiently with Angular´s change detection.

projects.title: Lufthansa booking & servicing application - WCAG compliant
projects.summary: The US DoT imposed to all the airlines with flights in USA to use WCAG compliant websites. This project was created for Lufthansa in order to fulfill this requirement.
highlights: Project to do the Lufthansa webapp (booking + servicing) accessible for screen readers (US DOT requirements), following correct web standards.
Partial migration of some components of the application from JSP/JQuery to ReactJS. All the new components must be compliant also with keyboard use.
Person to lead the full migration of the old CSS file (~12000 lines) into the new SASS structure (approximately 250 new files managed by Gulp).
Support with the new Edge browser in Windows 10.

projects.title: SAI - Santander Bank database management tool
projects.summary: System to manage the Santander Bank databases in Mexico redesigned for all browsers, mobiles and tablet devices.
highlights: Allows to modify the general state of databases, revert several changes of different users with backup sql, create databases backup, etc.
Different access areas depending on the personal permissions, different roles, etc.

projects.title: MIR - Risk management tool
projects.summary: System to analyze bank risk operations following the International regulatory framework for banks (Basel III).
highlights: Allows to present to the banks a detailed information related to the customer's non-payment risk.
Private access to different banks/saving banks in different countries such as Mexico BBVA or BANKIA.

projects.title: Ribbers
projects.summary: Studied and promoted solution for selling trainers via online shopping.
highlights: InDesign document for product promotion.
Evaluated online shopping solution based on Magento framework.

projects.title: Iberia Empleo
projects.summary: Public website and private area for job applicants.
highlights: Iberia Airlines redesigned for all browsers and for mobile and tablets devices with Iberia Airlines main page themes.

projects.title: Iberia Express Personal Management System
projects.summary: Internal webapp for Iberia Express employees to manage personal preferences and information, internal applications, etc.
highlights: Iberia Express redesigned for all browsers and for mobile and tablets devices with Twitter Bootstrap 3.

projects.title: Cofrentes Nuclear Power Station Management System
projects.summary: Internal webapp for Cofrentes employees to manage nuclear power station processes.
highlights: Renovation of the Cofrentes Nuclear Power Station Management System and the incorporation of different tools to convert Excel files into processes of the Nuclear Power Station and into Word files.
Designed for all browsers and for tablet and TV devices.

projects.title: Angular JS Experimental Project
projects.summary: Experimental project based on 'Chinpun' project module, developed entirely with AngularJS.
highlights: Designed for all browsers and for mobile and tablet devices with Twitter Bootstrap 3.

projects.title: Chinpun Company Management System
projects.summary: Technical University Final Project that consists on a management system webapp for the company and employees.
highlights: Grade: 10/10, Distinction.
Full design and developing of the MVC system to manage the company CRCIT with private access for employees.
Designed for all browsers and for mobile and tablet devices with Twitter Bootstrap 2.3.2.
Social Interface with the possibility to send alerts and comments instantaneously - improve project’s development.

projects.title: Juan Diego Miguel Website
projects.summary: Website to show the work of the artist Juan Diego Miguel.
highlights: Partial private access for customers.
Working on a website based on the latest design techniques with a minimalist view.
This website works against MySQL databases, some of them with more than 6000 records.
Designed for Chrome, Mozilla, IE9+, Safari and Opera browsers and for other devices such as mobile and tablets (IOS and Android).

history.summary: Frontend expert for Lufthansa/Miles and More clients.
highlights: Team expert in HTML/CSS-SASS/WCAG. The main tasks of this role are to maintain the code quality inside the team, give support and trainings to the team members and always keep updated in the latest news in the field.
Good communication between the team members in agile and very good atmosphere.
The working process with the QA was very efficient and allowed us to remarkably to reduce the direct PTRs opened in the client.
Total commitment in the project until the Sign Off.

I've been supporting DBS team in the initial setup and also giving them trainings. The goal is to prepare and support them as much as possible for the future inconvenience to be working in different countries.

Finally, I have been working in the configuration of the tooling process of building the webapp. The building tools used were Webpack and Gulp, with the introduction of testing modules in the new projects (karma and protractor for QA).

history.summary: Full Stack for Santander bank in Mexico / CECA bank
highlights: Participation in project phases: development, implementation and close-out.
Adapting the Project to different technologies (SQL, Oracle DB or DB2) depending on the client.
Interacting and supporting clients, solving technical or functional problems and doubts.
Developing (programming, debugging and testing) new and existing modules.
Designing and developing new tools for international clients.

history.summary: Company management system developer and designer
highlights: Designing and developing the structure of new front and back-end applications and the integration between them.
Planning and designing a database schema in Oracle Database 11g with Procedures, Functions and JOBS. Interaction realized with PL/SQL and HQL.
Developing (programming, debugging and testing) new and existing applications, managing configuration of application servers (BEA Weblogic 8.1) and web servers (Tomcat 7.0).
Mapping database schema with Hibernate.
Building project structures with Maven.
Re-designing old front-end applications and web services with new brand themes and styles using CSS3 and Bootstrap.
All product phases of the product implemented by me.
Strong skills in web design with CSS3, AJAX, Photoshop / Dreamweaver CS5 and Adobe Creative Cloud.

history.summary: Connecting systems with fiber optics and antenna installation

history.institution: Comillas Pontifical University - ICADE Business School
history.title: Business Consulting Master
curriculum: Business Consulting Master provided by Management Solutions company

history.institution: Higher Technical School of Telecommunications Engineering (ETSIT) - Technical University of Madrid
history.title: Telecommunication Engineer
curriculum: Master of Science accredited by: Engineering Accreditation Commission (ABET - Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology)

writing.title: Ampliación de un Sistema de Gestión de Recursos Empresariales para una Pyme del Sector TIC
author: Juan Diego de Miguel Mateo
writing.summary: Extended description about how the company and employee management system was created, all features implemented, technologies used in all the layers, etc.

speaking.title: 3D Surface Modelling from Curves
speaking.event: Advanced Topics in Graphical Engineering Systems
highlights: Grade (10/10 - Distinction)

speaking.title: WCAG conference
highlights: Periodic conferences to give a major WCAG perspective to new developers and how to cope it.

certificates.title: Certificate of Completion - Oracle Database 11g: Administration Workshop Ed II
Skills Report Certificate - Medium / High level - AEIPRO / IPMA / UPM

seminars.title: Advanced Topics in Graphical Engineering Systems

interests.name: Spend free time learning frontend technologies

aboutMe: I take seriously all development details, as for example how to improve the webapp or if the design is perfectly responsive for all devices
I like to read Frontend articles, stay alert on tweet news and check Youtube videos based on conferences (Google I/O, Web App Summit) or tutorials
I use to think when I finish a project how can I reuse the core structure and benefit from it, and also how to share it to other teams to have a company benefit.
I like brainstorming ideas to add to projects.
I'm passionate working with last frontend technologies such as Angular2 / React and learn how to improve the project's performance.
